term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - absolute lethal dose
term.title: absolute lethal dose

item.text: Lowest amount of a substance which kills 100% of test animals under defined conditions. This value is dependent on the number of organisms used in its assessment.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2003. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2007 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365092003)
